name: ROC UN
main_text: UN branch is located in the heart of the city and creates a cozy and comfortable environment where you can freely chat over coffee with friends and colleagues. The branch has a “chill zone” where you can listen to a wide array of records while sipping on your choice of hand-crafted coffee made by our specialist barista with from freshly roasted beans.
address: Address: 10th Building, Sukhbaatar street, West of United Nations building, Sukhbaatar District, Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia.
